title: Unable to log in, please help
body: When I try to log in to the client, it says did not recieve a response from the server, and then comes up with a login error. My internet is working just fine, what could the issue be and how could I solve it?

replies.body: Is this still occurring? What does [changing your DNS](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues#wq4) do?
